name: Boggled: A King's Field Creepypasta
description:
this  is a creepypasta based on the real fromsoftware game kings field
with creepypasta ASMR by me :) . (My pronouns are she/her. if you speak ill of me I will send my finest knights to Pontiff Sulyvahn's plaza.)

control
left click or button press on skeleton - fight
